@package tianbar

-- | A hook for XMonad window manager to send updates to the corresponding
--   Tianbar widget.
--   
--   You must include tianbar:scripts/xmonad.js in Tianbar configuration to
--   receive the updates.
--   
--   A <a>Renderer</a> can be used to fully customize the output. A
--   renderer is a function receiving all the status information and
--   returning HTML which will be displayed in the corresponding element of
--   the status bar.
--   
--   For convenience, a renderer returning <a>Markup</a> can be used as
--   well.
module System.Tianbar.XMonadLog

-- | Tianbar logger with a default renderer.
dbusLog :: Client -> X ()

-- | Tianbar logger with a Blaze renderer.
dbusLogWithMarkup :: Client -> MarkupRenderer -> X ()

-- | Tianbar logger with a renderer emitting a string.
dbusLogWithRenderer :: Client -> Renderer String -> X ()

-- | Default Tianbar renderer.
tianbarMarkup :: MarkupRenderer

-- | Workspace information.
data WindowSpaceInfo
WindowSpaceInfo :: String -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> WindowSpaceInfo

-- | workspace tag
wsTag :: WindowSpaceInfo -> String

-- | whether the workspace is current
wsCurrent :: WindowSpaceInfo -> Bool

-- | whether the workspace is hidden
wsHidden :: WindowSpaceInfo -> Bool

-- | whether the workspace has any urgent windows
wsUrgent :: WindowSpaceInfo -> Bool

-- | whether the workspace is empty (has no windows)
wsEmpty :: WindowSpaceInfo -> Bool

-- | A function to format the status information.
type Renderer a = String -> String -> [WindowSpaceInfo] -> [Window] -> WindowSet -> a
type MarkupRenderer = Renderer Markup
